nodes.name: Format Email Content

assignments.name: emailContent
assignments.value:
=

High Potential Property Opportunity

Address: {{ $json.address.street }}, {{ $json.address.city }}, {{ $json.address.state }} {{ $json.address.zip }}

Property Details:

  • Market Value: ${{ $json.marketValue }}
  • Equity: {{ $json.equityPercentage }}%
  • Owner Status: {{ $json.ownerStatus }}
  • Square Feet: {{ $json.squareFeet }}
  • Bedrooms: {{ $json.bedrooms }}
  • Bathrooms: {{ $json.bathrooms }}
  • Year Built: {{ $json.yearBuilt }}
  • Last Sale Date: {{ $json.lastSaleDate }}
  • Last Sale Price: ${{ $json.lastSalePrice }}

Owner Information:

  • Owner Name: {{ $json.owner.name }}
  • Mailing Address: {{ $json.owner.mailingAddress }}
  • Phone Numbers: {{ $json.owner.phoneNumbers ? $json.owner.phoneNumbers.join(', ') : 'N/A' }}
  • Email: {{ $json.owner.email || 'N/A' }}

This property appears to be a high-potential opportunity based on:

  • High equity percentage
  • Absentee owner

View on Google Maps

nodes.name: Sticky Note Main Flow

parameters.content:
## Main Workflow Flow
This part of the workflow handles the regular scanning and processing of property data. It runs on a schedule to detect new properties or changes to existing ones, then passes the filtered results along for detailed analysis.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note Filter & Analyze

parameters.content:
## Property Filtering & Analysis
Here we filter the properties based on criteria for high-potential leads (high equity %, absentee owners, etc.) and fetch detailed information about each property to prepare comprehensive reports for the sales team.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note Notifications

parameters.content:
## Notifications
This section delivers the property leads to the sales team through multiple channels:

1. Email alerts with detailed property and owner information
2. Slack notifications for quick updates

Both include Google Maps links to quickly view the property location.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note Instructions

parameters.content:
## Setup Instructions

1. **API Keys & Credentials**:
   - Add your BatchData API Key to the BatchData API Configuration node
   - Set up SMTP credentials for email delivery
   - Configure Slack API credentials for team notifications

2. **Customize Search Parameters**:
   - Adjust property search criteria in the BatchData API Configuration node
   - Modify the filtering conditions in the Filter High Potential node

3. **Notification Recipients**:
   - Update email recipients in the Send Email Alert node
   - Set appropriate Slack channel in the Post to Slack node

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Real Estate Market Scanning

## Overview
Automated workflow: Real Estate Market Scanning. This workflow integrates 10 different services: filter, httpRequest, stickyNote, code, scheduleTrigger. It contains 21 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 21
- **Node Types**: 10
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **Schedule Market Scan**: scheduleTrigger
- **BatchData API Configuration**: set
- **Query BatchData Properties**: httpRequest
- **Get Previous Results**: code
- **Compare Results**: code
- **Split Properties**: splitOut
- **Filter High Potential**: filter
- **Get Property Details**: httpRequest
- **Format Email Content**: set
- **Send Email Alert**: emailSend
- ... and 11 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible
